shabda dushanaya siddhawena aluthma widiyath kamituwa me ekkama hoyagannata samath wuna.ee aandu wirodhi kathabahe yedena pudgalayan kathabahedi nikuth karana shabda nisa athiwena parisara dushanaya.kamituwa wadiduratath hoyagaththe aanduwe deshapalana raswimwalata gas bandapu lawudspikar nikuthkaranne me pudgalayan nikuth karana desibal pramanayen dahaaten ekak kiyalayi.me dushanaya nawathwime palaweni piyawara widiyata langama bas saha dumriya wage podu prawahana sewawala aandu wirodhi kathakarayan gaman kirima thahanam karanawa athi.eyin balaporoththu wenne kanthoru dumriya wani podu sthanawala mewani kathakarayan ekathuwena eka walakwima.

porn gana mage mathaya passe dawasaka wenama lipiyakin liyanda hithan innawa.mama me lipiyen kiyanda hadanne mama antharjalayen labaganna wadagathma sewaya gana.ee thamayi hasyaya.aththatama mama anith dewalwaladi porak nowunata mage hasya rasawindana hakiyawa gana mama aadambarayi.mama hithan innawa mata honda hasya rasagnyathawayak thiyenawa kiyala.eeka pruthagjana minissunge hatine neda?.thamunta mokak hari puluwan kiyala andagena innawa witharak nemeyi anith unta eeka ba kiyala banina ekath karanawa.math ithin pruthagjanayek widihata ehemama thamayi.

baduraliya galahitiya mahamewuna wiharasthanaye galparwathayaka kanim kota nidhanayak ganimata katayuthu kala sakakaruwan siwdena mathugama mahesthrath daminda ramanayaka waligodapitiya mahatha wetha (16) idiripath kala pasu mema marthu 25 thek yali rimand bharaye thabimata niyoga kaleya.alubomulla poruwadanda, panadura pradeshawala padinchi mema sakakaruwan siwdena yagahoma sandaha gena aa drawya, thrirodarathaya samanga polisiya athadanguwata gena atha.nithignya thanuja galpaya mahathmiya sakakaruwan wenuwen peni sitiyaya.baduraliya polis sthanadhipathi damith jayathilaka, polis sarayan sumanawira yana mahathwaru adhikaranayata karunu wartha kaleya..

meya shri lankawe palamu dumriya margayayi. 1864 di kolambaa sita kilomitara 54 nagenahira desata wu ambaepussa dakwa palamu adiyara nima keruni. 1864 desambar 27 palamu dumriya dhawanaya kala athara 1865 okthobar 2 nila washayen wiwrutha wiya. 1867 mahanuwara dakwada, 1874 di nawalapitiya dakwa da,1885 di nanuoya dakwada, 1894 di bandarawela dakwada, 1924 di badulla dakwada mema margaya dirgha wiya. 1953 thek pradhana margaye washpa enjin magin dumriya dhawanaya kala athara 50 dashakaye di bi. di. rampala mahathage nayakathwayen wiwidha disal enjin sewayata ek keruni. 2011 di eksporel ha rajadhani ekspras sewa pradhana margaye aාrambha wuni.
